message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $15000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. To make this opportunity even more enticing, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14000. This is a fantastic deal considering its market value and the benefits it offers. I look forward to your positive response. Kind regards, Alice
